TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UIPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class UIPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class UIPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type UIPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 控制與使用者介面和 [剪貼簿] 相關的權限。

span.span: Controls the permissions related to user interfaces and the Clipboard.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 windows 中的繪圖和使用者輸入的事件都是使用者介面。Drawing and user input events in windows are user interfaces. 若要使用 windows 權限可以是下列其中之一： 無限制，限制為，則只，或不繪製視窗或使用者輸入允許的事件存取。The permission to use windows can be one of the following: unrestricted, limited to , only , or no window drawing or user input event access allowed. 和標題和大小，以避免可能的詐騙可能有害的程式碼中的限制。 and are restricted in title and size to prevent possible spoofing by potentially harmful code. 使用剪貼簿的權限可以是下列其中之一： 無限制，僅限寫入，或允許任何剪貼簿存取。The permission to use the Clipboard can be one of the following: unrestricted, write-only, or no Clipboard access allowed. 貼上的限制會防止可能有害的應用程式，從取得資料，從剪貼簿，而不需要使用者同意，同時仍然允許剪下、 複製和貼上作業時由使用者透過鍵盤命令。The paste limitation prevents potentially harmful applications from taking data from the Clipboard without the user's consent, while still allowing the cut, copy, and paste operations when initiated by the user through keyboard commands.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with either fully restricted or unrestricted access, as specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立完全限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`權限形式。This constructor creates either the fully restricted (`None`) or the `Unrestricted` form of the permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用建構函式。The following code example shows the use of the constructor. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UIPermission/CPP/uipermission.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UIPermission/CS/uipermission.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.UIPermission/VB/uipermission.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同類型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新權限就是 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會說明兩者所共同描述的作業集合的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 具體來說，最嚴格的值表示和從目前的使用權限和指定的權限。Specifically, it represents the least permissive values of and from those in the current permission and the specified permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: 要測試子集關聯性的權限。

span.span: A permission to test for the subset relationship.

param.span: 這個權限必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: This permission must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前權限是指定權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的權限順利完成目前的權限的所有要求所指定權限也都成功時所指定權限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if all demands that succeed for the current permission also succeed for the specified permission. 也就是所指定權限至少包含在子集中所包含的權限。That is, the specified permission contains at least the permissions contained in the subset. 針對返回`true`，這兩個和目前使用權限的值必須等於或超過指定的權限的值較寬鬆。For to return `true`, both the and values of the current permission must be equal to or less permissive than the values of the specified permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. summary.span: 傳回值，指出目前的權限是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果目前的權限不受限制，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不受限制的權限，表示存取權限所保護的所有資源。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同類型。

span.span: It must be the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表目前權限所代表的所有作業，以及由指定的權限的所有作業的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by the current permission as well as all the operations represented by the specified permission. 具體來說，最寬鬆的值表示和從目前的使用權限和指定的權限。Specifically, it represents the most permissive values of and from those in the current permission and the specified permission. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的行為方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 在程式碼範例被要示範的方法，不是用來示範其使用的行為。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 一般情況下，將權限類別的方法使用由安全性基礎結構它們通常不使用應用程式中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
